name: Car Driving Sim
description:
Take control of 3 radio-controlled car in a huge environment with 2 racetracks, a water basin, and a mogul field !
Accomplish a lot of variety of missions to become a good driver.

!! Car Driving Simulator contains 30 levels !!

Example of missions :
- Take the bridge in the wrong way, and dodge the cars
- Don't hit the pedestrians and drive safely with your speed car
- Do all the stunts with your monster truck
- Transport the cargo to the parking pad
- Finish the racetrack, and be the first. (2 circuits)
- Car chase: follow the car and don't let you outrun
- Finish the obstacle course without crashing with your offroad car
- Catch all the gangsters before they escape
- Follow the helicopter and the airplane
- Drive offroad with your monster truck
- Destroy all of the objects around you
- Get the birds out of the park

Totally free, without "in-app purchase" !
You must have (at least) a cpu of 1 GHz in order to play without lag.
